articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of Unhasu Orchestra
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, enjoyed concert "The Hearts Following the Sun" commemorating the Day of the Shining Star given by the Unhasu Orchestra on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Jong Un waved to the enthusiastically cheering audience. 
					
					The audience observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					Put on the stage were chorus "Smile of Love", serial songs of immortal masterpieces "Embrace of Country" and "Greeting the Sun Rise over the Taedong River", chorus "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", trombone solo and chorus "Thinking of the General", female sextet "Our Father," female solo and pangchang "We Will Become Flowers Heralding Spring before Others," mixed quartet and pangchang "We Will Resemble the General," narration and orchestral music "Tears of Korea", chorus "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and other colorful numbers.
					
					In the concert its performers represented the unbounded yearning and reverence of the service personnel and the people for Kim Jong Il who laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness, undergoing for decades all sorts of sufferings which nobody else in this world has ever experienced.
					
					Songs and narrations dealt with the stirring reality of the country which has turned into a Songun power, a state which achieved single-minded unity and socialist paradise thanks to the patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience.
					
					He highly appreciated their successful performance, expressing great satisfaction over the splendid performance as it is distinct in its ideological and thematic stand and fully reflected the ardent aspiration and desire, firm pledge and readiness of the Korean people.
					
					He noted it was a wonderful performance which may instill strength and courage into the service personnel and people of the DPRK accelerating the advance for a great revolutionary surge with reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					He expressed expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the orchestra would encourage the service personnel and people of the DPRK through their dynamic art creation and performing activities.
					
					Among the audience were Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, U Tong Chuk, officials of party, state and armed forces organs, power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions and in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, service personnel of the KPA and people from all walks of life in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Greeting to Gambian President
articles.content:
Greeting to Gambian President
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Gambian President Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in the message wished the friendly Gambian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Director General of ITAR-Tass
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Director General of ITAR-TASS
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Thursday received a letter from Vitaly Ignatenko, director general of ITAR-TASS, on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The letter said:
					
					Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					I, on behalf of all the employees of ITAR-TASS, a major news agency of Russia, and on my own behalf, extend warmest and sincerest congratulations to you on the Day of the Shining Star, national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					For the Korean people this day is the significant 70th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					He lives in the hearts of officials of ITAR-TASS a true and honest minded and reliable friend who made a great contribution to the development of the Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					We will never forget the fact that Comrade Kim Jong Il gave two interviews to ITAR-TASS among world media to evoke broad socio-political repercussions worldwide.
					
					Availing myself of the national holiday, I wish Comrade Kim Jong Un always good things, happiness and good health and success in the work for the development of the friendship between the peoples of Russia and the DPRK.
					
					I extend best congratulations to you.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow gave a reception on Feb. 14 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there on invitation were a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia, deputies to the State Duma, members of the Federation Council and officials of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions including the "United Russia" Party, "A Just Russia", the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Liberal Democratic Party, the Party for Peace and Unity, the All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Defense, the Minister of Interior, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economy and Development, the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Culture, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Academy of Sciences, the Gazprom, the Russian Railways Company, the Moscow City Government, the Moscow City War Veterans Association and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung standing together with Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					Igor Morgulov, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia, in his speech said that 2011 was a year when the Korean people suffered a great loss. President Medvedev and officials of various strata of Russia expressed deep condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					All this clearly proves what enormous and great feats he performed for developing the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he said.
					
					His visit to the Siberian and Far East Regions and meeting and talks with Medvedev were distinguished and historic events which gave strong impetus to the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he stressed.
					
					Referring to the brisk cooperation between the two countries in the economic field, he highly estimated the principled stand of the DPRK on the six-party talks.
					
					An art performance was given by the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior at the reception.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met and had a talk with the art troupe of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ryong Su, head of the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					Present there was Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who is the head of the delegation of Koreans in Japan for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Mexican Rival
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Mexican Rival
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's team defeated its Mexican rival 1:0 at the Friday match of the 2012 Four-nation Women's Soccer Invitation.
					The DPRK beat south Korea 1:0 on the first-day match.
					
					On Sunday the DPRK team will have its last game with the Chinese team.

articles.title: Famous Couple Figure Skaters from China
articles.content:
Famous Couple Figure Skaters from China
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A three-day 21st International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star closed at the Ice Rink in Pyongyang on Friday.
					Figure skaters from several countries crowned the festival with their demonstration performances.
					
					Among them were a married couple from China, Shen Xue and Zhao Hongbo.
					
					The pair won gold medals at Olympics and world championships. 
					
					Zhao Hongbo, recollecting his performance at the international figure skating festival held in Pyongyang 19 years ago, told KCNA:
					
					"I am very pleased to participate in this festival to commemorate the first Day of the Shining Star with the Korean people.
					
					The Chinese and Korean people have a long history of friendship.
					
					I am so happy to meet old Korean friends in Pyongyang and see people enjoying my demonstration."
					
					He hoped that he would meet Koreans again in the coming festivals.

articles.title: French Players Conspicuous at February Figure Skating Festival
articles.content:
French Players Conspicuous at February Figure Skating Festival
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- French players, title holders of European championships, deeply impressed the spectators at the on-going 21st International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize.
					The festival opened on Wednesday, a day before the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, culminated in the demonstration performance by famous figure skaters from various countries. 
					
					29-year old Natalie Pechalat and 32-year old Fabian Bourzat told e KCNA it was the third time for them to take part in the festival. They have become friendly with figure skaters of the DPRK and realized that their technique has developed. 
					
					They said they could see that the festival is a renowned one as many famous figure skaters of different countries participate in it.
					
					Through TV, they heard the news of passing of leader Kim Jong Il and saw the Korean people grieving.
					
					They also said that in Pyongyang, they could see the Korean people who turned sorrow into strength.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure-skating Festival Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure-skating Festival Closes
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The 21st Paektusan Prize International Figure-skating Festival was closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Friday.
					The festival opened on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, officials concerned and sportspersons, overseas compatriots delegations and compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and foreign guests.
					
					At the closing ceremony festival prizes were awarded to figure skaters from Russia, China, Bulgaria, France, Finland and the DPRK who displayed high skills.
					
					Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, addressed the closing ceremony.
					
					He expressed belief that figure skaters from different countries would visit Pyongyang to more significantly observe the Day of the Shining Star in the idea of independence, friendship and peace in the future.
					
					And there was a demonstration performance of figure skaters from different countries and the DPRK.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Give Art Performance
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Give Art Performance
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The art group of schoolchildren gave performance at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Friday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					The colorful numbers included song of triplets "My Mother", immortal masterpiece, and male vocal solo and chorus "General Is the Whole World".
					
					The performers represented with deep emotion the boundless reverence of schoolchildren for Kim Jong Il who provided a solid foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					Dance duet "An Accordion Carrying Loving Care", folk singing in unison "Thanks for the Care of the Party" and other numbers successfully dealt with the children growing to be reliable pillars of Songun Korea under the loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					True story "General and Children of Revolutionary School" and story telling and chorus "Footsteps" fully reflected unshakable will of schoolchildren to carry forward the tradition of Mt. Paektu under the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and school youth and children.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Music and dance performance "Song of Eternal Sun" was given by an art troupe of Koreans in Japan at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Friday in commemoration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). 
					Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Chun and other officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					Among the audience were the delegation of Koreans in Japan, delegations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and overseas compatriots.
					
					The performers put on the stage narration and dance "We Want to Go", mixed quartet "Attraction and Reverence" and other numbers which impressively represented the strong yearning for Kim Jong Il and the conviction and will to hold him in high esteem forever.
					
					Mixed chorus "Everything Is Possible Once Determined" and song and dance "Footsteps" and "The General Is Eternal like the Sun" mesmerized the audience as they reflected the firm determination of the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to carry forward the patriotic tradition, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Popular Korean Singer in Japan
articles.content:
Popular Korean Singer in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- People's Artiste Ri Yong Su of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan is now popular for his song "I Will Never Sell My Soul".
					He is giving performance in Pyongyang as a member of the art troupe of Koreans in Japan to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Smooth and soft verses followed by dynamic refrain silence the auditorium in no time.
					
					The 47-year old popular singer has been active in the art organization named by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					With his songs he heartened Koreans in Japan to keep to the path of patriotism. He composed dozens of songs including "Kim Jong Il, Father of 700 000 Koreans in Japan" and "My Way."
					
					The song "I Will Never Sell My Soul", his own creation, also reflects the will of the Koreans in Japan to remain Korean nationals despite trials and hardships.
					
					President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il appreciated his songs several occasions including the April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					They even provided his vocal recital in the homeland.

articles.title: Patriotic-minded Korean Dancer in Japan
articles.content:
Patriotic-minded Korean Dancer in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yu Ri, actress of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, is attracting the audience with her dance "Traditional Korean Jacket and Skirt". 
					A music and dance performance by the art troupe of Koreans in Japan is going on at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					To the applauding audience, she said her life experience made her dance truthful. 
					
					During her primary school days some two decades ago, it occurred to her one day to witness a Korean girl in Korean dress being assaulted by Japanese rascals in a bystreet. This reminded her of what she was told by her parents about crimes the Japanese imperialists committed during their colonial rule over Korea. 
					
					The Japanese prevented Korean women from wearing traditional Korean dresses by menacing them with knives. They even threw ink into those in Korean jackets and long skirts.  
					
					Kim came up with an idea to dance in Korean dress to inspire the Korean residents in Japan with confidence.  
					
					Being interested in dancing, she learned it with the help of her father. She often watched performances given by the opera troupe. 
					
					After becoming a dancer of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe she chose a Korean dress dance as her maiden work.
					
					She met many Koreans in Japan to listen to how they had defended the nationality despite the Japanese reactionaries' suppression. She also met students at Korean schools to see girls wearing Korean dresses.
					
					When she came to the homeland, she visited national art troupes to study Korean dance rhythms. 
					
					She performed solo dance, result of her hard work, everywhere Koreans lived in Japan, exciting Koreans.
					
					In March last year when Japan was hit by massive earthquake and tsunami, she encouraged the tsunami-battered Korean compatriots with the dance.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from Feb. 5 to 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Km Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). They included seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows n Russia, Benin, UK, Cambodia, Nepal, India, Indonesia, Peru, Romania and Malaysia.
					Displayed in their venues were works of Kim Jong Il, books and photos on his feats and photos of the struggle of the Korean people for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					The participants in films shows watched "Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp", "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu", "Matchless Ranks of Paraders Which Have Won Victory after Victory ", "Reply of Korea" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and other Korean films.
					
					The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia praised Kim Jong Il as the people's father who devoted his all to the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					The president of the Socialist Party of Benin noted that the Workers' Party of Korea could settle all the issues arising in the revolution and construction in conformity with the specific conditions of its country and its people's aspiration and advance along the road of victory only without slightest deviation. This is ascribable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the president stated.
					
					The secretary general of the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power by carrying forward the revolutionary idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and chairman of the Nepali National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the 70th Birth Anniversary of Leader Kim Jong Il, noted that the idea, political mode and feats of Kim Jong Il will last forever.
					
					The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution and achieving the world socialist cause.
					
					Messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Russia, UK Nepal and India.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated by Organs of Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated by Organs of Foreign Political Parties
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Organs of political parties of Cambodia, Palestine and the U.S. carried special write-ups on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Pracheachon, the organ of the People's Party of Cambodia, on Feb. 8 carried an article titled "Great man Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					The international community is praising Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, as a distinguished great man, the paper said, and went on:
					
					He was the outstanding thinker and theoretician and the great master of leadership and independent politics.
					
					He gave perfect answers to all the issues arising in the revolution and construction by steadily developing and enriching the Juche idea as required by the times and the developing revolution.
					
					He developed in depth the Songun idea based on the Juche idea to suit the conditions of the new era, formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism, thus providing a powerful ideological and theoretical guarantee for the triumphant advance of the socialist cause under any hard circumstances and conditions.
					
					The February issue of Ilal Amam, the organ of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine, carried an article illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The article said: Kim Jong Il's works are the first must books for the Juche idea followers. His ideas and theories involve all fabrics  of society including politics, economy, military affairs and culture, beginning with the strategic line to protect the interests of the country and the nation and carry forward and accomplish the socialist cause. 
					
					He further strengthened the unity and cohesion of the society of the DPRK with his benevolent politics, all-embracing politics.
					
					He defended world peace and security through his energetic external activities.
					
					The Feb. 9 issue of Workers' World, the organ of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America, devoted its one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Day of the Shining Star was commemorated by televisions and radios of different countries
					Apsara TV and Radio of Cambodia on Feb. 9 and 10 reported: Feb. 16 marks the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. The DPRK instituted the day as the Day of the Shining Star and significantly commemorates the day.
					
					Kim Jong Il, the great master of independent politics, wisely led the struggle of the progressive people to build an independent new society.
					
					The Pyongyang Declaration has been so far signed by more than 270 political parties.
					
					Kim Jong Il defended the world peace and security through his energetic external activities.
					
					The international community is highly praising him as a distinguished great man.
					
					The Lao National Radio on Feb. 10 introduced the life of Kim Jong Il dedicated to the people under the title "Comrade Kim Jong Il, benevolent leader of the Korean people".
					
					TV of Equatorial Guinea on Feb. 8 reported the following program five times:
					
					HE Kim Jong Il passed away to the people's sorrow but the feats he performed for global independence will always throw their rays.
					
					The Korean people are now dynamically advancing for the prosperity and development of the country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Equatorial Guinean people wholeheartedly hope that only victory and glory will be in store for the fraternal Korean people significantly commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and are convinced that the traditional friendly relations between the two countries will continue to develop on good terms.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Published in Brazil, Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Published in Brazil, Sweden
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Brazil on Feb. 10.
					The work, published on July 26, 1996, clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original philosophy evolved and systemized by its own peculiar principles and a revolutionary and popular philosophy which truly serves the purpose of the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					His work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was jointly brought out in booklet by the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The nearly 70 year-long history of Kim Jong Il is recorded with the undying feats performed by him for the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, the statement said.
					
					Born as the son of guerrillas on Mt. Paektu, he successfully carried forward and developed the revolutionary cause of the President, defended the purity of the Juche idea and performed undying feats not only in idea, theory and development of history and the world politics but in socialist economic construction and defence upbuilding of the DPRK, it noted.
					
					He opened up a bright prospect for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself", it stated.
					
					Noting that he, as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, resolutely shattered the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group's moves for aggression and put the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation on the highest level with his original Songun politics, it said, and went on:
					
					He was the people's leader who made ceaseless journeys for field guidance while always sharing bitters and sweets with the people, and the great man who made a great contribution to the world revolution.

articles.title: Foreign Personage Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Foreign Personage Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Lyne Sinyodyium, director of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					She said: Kim Jong Il was the son of Mt. Paektu who personified the spirit of Mt. Paektu and Lake Chon.
					
					He, the people's leader combined with pen and sword, developed and enriched the Juche idea through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and pursued the Songun politics, defending the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					Though he passed away, the feats he performed for the human cause of independence will last forever.
					
					We are convinced that the Korean people will register greater successes in building a thriving nation under the outstanding and wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, successor to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Russian FM Calls for Establishing Fair World Order
articles.content:
Russian FM Calls for Establishing Fair World Order
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from Feb. 5 to 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Km Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). They included seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows n Russia, Benin, UK, Cambodia, Nepal, India, Indonesia, Peru, Romania and Malaysia.
					Displayed in their venues were works of Kim Jong Il, books and photos on his feats and photos of the struggle of the Korean people for the building of a thriving nation.

					The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia praised Kim Jong Il as the people's father who devoted his all to the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					The president of the Socialist Party of Benin noted that the Workers' Party of Korea could settle all the issues arising in the revolution and construction in conformity with the specific conditions of its country and its people's aspiration and advance along the road of victory only without slightest deviation. This is ascribable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the president stated.
					
					The secretary general of the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power by carrying forward the revolutionary idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Iran Condemns Terrorism and Israel's Psychological Warfare
articles.content:
Iran Condemns Terrorism and Israel's Psychological Warfare
Tehran, February 16 (KCNA) -- Iran on Monday condemned all forms of terrorism by denying accusations of Israel over Iran's alleged involvement in attacks on diplomatic targets in Georgia and India, and noted that such accusations are part of Israel's psychological warfare against Iran.
					"The Zionist regime has a serious record of criminal acts against humanity, and is the prime suspect in any terrorist operation in the world", said Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesman, Ramin Mehmanparast.
					
					"Iran is the major victim of terrorism", Ramin Mehmanparast noted.

articles.title: Myanmar President Reiterates Clean government, Good governance
articles.content:
Myanmar President Reiterates Clean government, Good governance
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Myanmar President Thein Sein reiterated on Sunday that his government is focusing on clean government and good governance in building nation.
					"Successful establishment of modern, developed democratic new nation calls for combination of democracy with good governance," Thein Sein said in his message on the occasion of the country's 65th anniversary of the Union Day.
					
					He called on people in the country to make joint efforts to boost modernization of the nation and socio-economic improvement of its people. 
					
					He urged participation of the entire nationalities in bringing internal armed conflicts to an end and building lasting peace in the country.

articles.title: Pakistan Protests against U.S. Interference in Its Internal Affairs
articles.content:
Pakistan Protests against U.S. Interference in Its Internal Affairs
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Pakistan on Monday summoned American Charge d'Affaires Richard Hoagland after a formal protest was lodged against him over last week's discussion in a congressional hearing on the situation in the country's southwestern Balochistan province. 
					The charge d'Affaires was informed that this was unacceptable as it amounted to interference in the internal affairs of the country, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement.
					
					Meanwhile, the National Assembly of Pakistan passed a unanimous resolution Monday night, condemning the U.S. Congressional hearing on Balochistan.
					
					The resolution said that the U.S. House Committee on Foreign Affairs has interfered in the internal affairs of Pakistan and the U.S. Congress members had been silent over the killings of innocent people in American drone strikes.
					
					The National Assembly, Lower House of the parliament, said that Pakistan will not accept any interference in the internal affairs of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de director general de ITAR-TASS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de director general de ITAR-TASS
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le dirigiera el dia 16 el director general de la agencia noticiera rusa ITAR-TASS V. N. Ignatenko con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente         Kim Jong Il.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Estimado camarada Kim Jong Un.
					
					Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, fiesta nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le envio la felicitacion mas cordial y sincera en nombre mio y de todos los empleados de ITAR-TASS, importante agencia noticiera de Rusia.
					
					Para el pueblo coreano hoy es un dia significado, o sea el septuagesimo cumpleanos del gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il.
					
					El camarada Kim Jong Il esta vivo en el corazon de los funcionarios de ITAR-TASS como amigo sincero, generoso y confiable quien hizo un gran aporte al fortalecimiento y desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Rusia-Corea.
					
					No olvidaremos nunca el hecho de que el camarada Kim Jong Il concedio en dos ocasiones entrevistas unicamente a ITAR-TASS de entre los medios de prensa masiva del mundo dando inmensa repercusion socio-politica tanto en Rusia como en escala mundial.
					
					Con motivo de la fiesta nacional coreana, le deseo al camarada Kim Jong Un siempre buenas cosas, felicidad, buena salud y exitos en su labor para fortalecer y desarrollar la amistad entre los pueblos de Rusia y Corea.
					
					Reciba la felicitacion mas excelente.

articles.title: Clausurado XXI Festival de Patinaje por Premio Paektusan
articles.content:
Clausurado XXI Festival de Patinaje por Premio Paektusan
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 17 en el Complejo de Patinaje bajo Techo el XXI Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan que se habia iniciado el dia 15 con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					En la ceremonia de clausura participaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros, deportistas, las delegaciones de coreanos en ultramar y otros compatriotas, el representante del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En la ocasion fue otorgado el premio del festival  a los patinaderos de Rusia, China, Bulgaria, Francia, Finlandia y Corea quienes demostraron altas tecnicas.
					
					El ministro de Deportes, Pak Myong Chol, en su discurso de clausura, expreso conviccion de que los patinaderos de diversos paises visitaran Pyongyang tambien en el futuro para conmemorar bien el Dia de la Estrella Luz bajo el ideal de la independencia, la amistad y la paz. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, se ofrecio la actuacion modelo de los patinadores extranjeros y coreanos.

articles.title: Organos de partidos de varios paises alaban a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Organos de partidos de varios paises alaban a Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los organos de partidos de Camboya, Palestina y Estados Unidos publicaron ediciones especiales. 
					El organo del Partido del Pueblo de Camboya, Pracheachon, divulgo el dia 8 el articulo intitulado "Kim Jong Il, gran hombre" adjuntado una foto de este y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un estando juntos en la tribuna de la Plaza Kim Il Sung. 
					
					El articulo senala que la sociedad internacional elogia al Dirigente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Jong Il como gran hombre sin igual. 
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, destacado ideologo y teorico, maestro de direccion y de politica independiente, desarrollo y enriquecio constantemente la idea Juche de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo y dio perfectas respuestas a todos los problemas que se presentan en la revolucion y la construccion, afirma.
					
					Prosigue que el Dirigente profundizo la idea del Songun arraigada en la idea Juche, conforme a las condiciones de la epoca nueva y formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo politico socialista y de esta manera, preparo firme garantia ideo-teorica para llevar adelante la causa socialista aun en medio de cualesquier circunstancias dificiles. 
					
					La revista Ilal Amam, organo del Frente Popular de Liberacion de Palestina, publico en su edicion de febrero un articulo junto con una foto del Dirigente. 
					
					Las obras del Dirigente son las obras obligatorias para los adeptos a la idea Juche, subraya y agrega que sus ideologias y teorias aclaran la linea estrategica para defender los intereses del pais y nacion y llevar adelante la causa socialista y abarcan todos los dominios sociales como la politica, la economia, los asuntos militares y la cultura. 
					
					El Dirigente fortalecio la unidad monolitica de la sociedad coreana practicando la politica abarcadora y de beneficios populares y defendio la paz y la seguridad del mundo librando energicas actividades exteriores, puntualiza. 
					
					El organo del Partido Mundial de los Obreros de Estados Unidos, Workers´ World tambien ofrecio una edicion especial en un entero plano junto con una foto del Dirigente Kim Jong Il inspeccionando a una unidad del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
